instruction: Invent a new recipe using five of the ingredients below.
input: Sea salt, olive oil, fish, potatoes, tomatoes
output: Fish and Potato Bake – a simple yet delicious dish! Preheat oven to 350°F. In a bowl, mix together potatoes, diced tomatoes, 1 tablespoon of olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon of sea salt, and 1/2 teaspoon of your favorite spices. Put the mixture in a casserole dish and top it with four fillets of your favorite fish. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon of sea salt. Bake for 35-45 minutes until the fish is cooked through and the potatoes are tender. Serve with your favorite side dish and enjoy!
